text: Campomanesia espiritosantensis is a species of plant in the family Myrtaceae. The plant is endemic to southeastern Brazil, including in the Atlantic Forest ecoregion. ==References== espiritosantensis Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Atlantic Forest (biome) Category:Flora of Espírito Santo Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Campomanesia espiritosantensis
